name: Monroe Elementary School
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grade: K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper Monroe is a diverse school located in the Excelsior district that hosts three language programs serving children from many linguistic backgrounds around the city. They offer an English Language Development, a Chinese Bilingual, and a Spanish Immersion program.
